subject: Tests and Testing
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The testing regimen at the W.B.C. will be more stringent than Major League Baseball’s, with testing for more stimulants and with more tests over all, but none involving blood.
snippet: The testing regimen at the W.B.C. will be more stringent than Major League Baseball’s, with testing for more stimulants and with more tests over all, but none involving blood.
